Waypoint.label: moveRunesOutside
Waypoint.script:
--Name of runes to move: local nameAttackRuneToMove = (nameAttackRune)
--Name of runes to move: local nameAreaRuneToMove = (nameAreaRune)
--Name of backpack that have all potions to move: local from = (mainBp)
--Name of backpack to move all potions into: local to = (supBp)
if useAttackRunes == true then local moveLimitARune = 20 local moveTimesARune = 0 while ((itemcount(nameAttackRuneToMove, mainBp) > 1) and (moveTimesARune <= moveLimitARune)) do moveitems(nameAttackRuneToMove, to, from, 100) wait(1000) moveTimesARune = moveTimesARune + 1 end end
if useAreaRunes == true then local moveLimitArRune = 20 local moveTimesArRune = 0 while ((itemcount(nameAreaRuneToMove, mainBp) > 1) and (moveTimesArRune <= moveLimitArRune)) do moveitems(nameAreaRuneToMove, to, from, 100) wait(1000) moveTimesArRune = moveTimesArRune + 1 end end
wait(1000) setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "yes") wait(1000)

Waypoint.label: checkEquipAmuletRing3
Waypoint.script:
if withdrawAmuletsEquipInsideHunt == true or withdrawRingsEquipInsideHunt == true then setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/AmuletRing Equipper/Enabled", "no") if useExtraBackpack == true then if itemname($neck.id) == nameAmuletWithdraw or itemname($neck.id) == nameAmuletEquip then moveitems($neck.id, extraBp, 'neck') end
if itemname($finger.id) == nameRingsWithdraw or itemname($finger.id) == nameRingsEquip then moveitems($finger.id, extraBp, 'finger') end else --if itemname($neck.id) == nameAmuletWithdraw or itemname($neck.id) == nameAmuletEquip --then moveitems($neck.id, lootBp, 'neck') --end
--if itemname($finger.id) == nameRingsWithdraw or itemname($finger.id) == nameRingsEquip --then moveitems($finger.id, lootBp, 'finger') --end end elseif withdrawAmuletsEquipInsideHunt == false and withdrawRingsEquipInsideHunt == false then setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/AmuletRing Equipper/Enabled", "yes") end

setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/Auto Haste Path/Enabled", "yes") setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/Force Refill/Enabled", "no") setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/Anti Invisible/Enabled", "no") setlooting("off") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Werebear/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped", "yes") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Wereboar/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped", "yes") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Werebadger/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped", "yes") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Werewolf/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped", "yes")
if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("leave_first_floor") end

Waypoint.label: cornellTalk2
Waypoint.script: reachcreature("Cornell") wait(2000) if (getcreature("Cornell").dist <= 3) then say("hi") wait(2000) foreach newmessage m do if m.sender == "Cornell" and m.content == "I'll sail you nowhere as long as you are infected with were-sickness! I'm sorry, but we decided to put all infected persons in quarantine to ensure the mainland's safety." then useitem("purple nightshade blossoms") wait(5000, 8000) end end npcsay("sail") wait(1000) npcsay("yes") wait(1000) end
if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("leave_grimvale") end
if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("return_edron") end
gotolabel(0, "City B")

Waypoint.label: checkUseTrainer
Waypoint.script: if getuseroption("trainSkill") == true and $stamina <= staminaTime then gotolabel("go_to_trainers") else gotolabel(0, "City") end
if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("go_to_trainers") end

Waypoint.label: useTrainers
Waypoint.script:
setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/Auto Safe Reconnect/Enabled", "no")
if getuseroption("trainSkillType") == "Sword" then reachgrounditem(16198) wait(200, 500) useitem(16198, 'ground') elseif getuseroption("trainSkillType") == "Axe" then reachgrounditem(16199) wait(200, 500) useitem(16199, 'ground') elseif getuseroption("trainSkillType") == "Club" then reachgrounditem(16200) wait(200, 500) useitem(16200, 'ground') elseif getuseroption("trainSkillType") == "Distance" then reachgrounditem(16201) wait(200, 500) useitem(16201, 'ground') elseif getuseroption("trainSkillType") == "Magic" then reachgrounditem(16202) wait(200, 500) useitem(16202, 'ground') end
setcavebot("off") messagebox("BlakW Scripts Notification", "You character reached and used an offline-trainer.") gotolabel(0, "City")
